name: Why we need to put accessibility first.
description:
My talk from Config 2020!


The story:

When growing up, i've always had the dream of working on apps and getting them into the hands of as many people as possible. Designing apps and websites that enrich people's lives in meaningful ways.


This hasn't always been the case.


Too often apps and services are designed for the same "core" user group. Users who have perfect hearing and vision, and strong digital and literacy skills. Excluding people with accessibility needs.


There's currently over 1 billion people with some form of disability globally. This figure is only rising. Yet the most popular apps and services often exclude these needs.


People understand there’s a need and the benefits of accessibility, but who’s taking ownership to implement this in your company ?


The sooner you start implementing accessibility across your business strategy, the earlier you start reaping the rewards.
